website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful and inexpensive glass teapot warmer that works with most teapots under 4.5" in diameter.
pros: Works with most teapots with a base of up to 4.5" in diameter
Nice look, particularly with a glass teapot
Because it's glass, it is also a good light source
cons: Not compatible with short, wide-based teapots
Some reports of tea candles not burning well within this warmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So I actually bought this to keep my coffee warm (I use a glass pour-over coffee maker) and it works perfectly. I saw that some people wrote that the candle goes out but I haven't had that happen at all. Stays lit just fine. I imagine this would work just as well with teapots too
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Holes too small
customer_reviews.text: The holes on the warmer are too small so the tea light inside won’t get enough oxygen to burn more than a minute, there are holes on top but since my teapot fits exactly no oxygen passes through those holes, please measure the bottom of your teapot before you buy it, the bottom your teapot should be smaller than the warmers diameter, I wish I could return it but I waited too long to use it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: MASOUD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Candle goes off every time I put my kettle on. This one went back.
customer_reviews.author: K. Soo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Used it with a glass teapot and they matched perfectly
customer_reviews.author: INTP Reliability

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need for a clear glass teapot I already have. Price was reasonable. Shipping was very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: The perfect teapot warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, it perfectly fits my teapot and keeps it warm without making the bottom too hot (a concern I had with my glass teapot). Also they designed the metal platform on which the teapot sits very well, I can have the candle burning for a long time and it doesn't make that platform too hot to touch, so it's easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Candle would not stay lit longer than a few seconds. I tried cutting the wik to different lengths but this made no difference. I’m very disappointed. I was really looking forward to adding this to my morning tea “ritual”.
customer_reviews.author: DD
